name: uun121p1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylbir(wa(w0, w1), w2, wa(wa(w0, w1), w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), w0), wa(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, w1), w0), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w1), w0), wa(w0, w1))

comment: A deduction unionizing a non-unionized collection of virtual hypotheses. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 4-Feb-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
